mapper.select: SELECT IW_NUMBER, IW_TITLE, IW_CONTENT,IW_REGDATE,IW_VIEWS, IW_OPEN_YN, IW_WRITER_MEMBER_CODE, (SELECT AD_NAME FROM TBL_ADMIN WHERE AD_CODE=IW_WRITER_MEMBER_CODE) as AD_NAME FROM TBL_INFO_W
SELECT IW_NUMBER, IW_TITLE, IW_CONTENT, IW_REGDATE, IW_VIEWS, IW_OPEN_YN, (SELECT AD_NAME FROM TBL_ADMIN WHERE AD_CODE=IW_WRITER_MEMBER_CODE) as AD_NAME FROM TBL_INFO_W WHERE IW_NUMBER = ${iwNumber}

insert.selectKey: INSERT INTO TBL_INFO_W(IW_NUMBER, IW_TITLE, IW_CONTENT, IW_WRITER_MEMBER_CODE, IW_REGDATE,IW_OPEN_YN) VALUES(nextval('seq_admin_info'), #{title}, #{content}, #{writerMemberCode}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{openYN}) RETURNING IW_NUMBER

mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_INFO_W SET IW_TITLE=#{title}, IW_CONTENT=#{content}, IW_OPEN_YN=#{openYN} WHERE IW_NUMBER=#{iwNumber}
UPDATE TBL_INFO_W SET IW_VIEWS = IW_VIEWS + 1 WHERE IW_NUMBER=#{iwNumber}
